recommendations.title: Optimize Emergency Fund
recommendations.description: Increase savings rate by 5% to reach 3-6 months' expenses in the next 6 months.
recommendations.reasoning: User's cash flow shows a consistent income, but the emergency fund is below target. Increasing the savings rate will help build a cushion against unexpected expenses.

recommendations.title: Reduce Dining Out Expenses
recommendations.description: Reduce dining out expenses by 20% to free up $200/month for savings and debt repayment.
recommendations.reasoning: User's behavior result indicates overspending in dining out, which can be optimized to allocate funds towards savings and debt repayment.

recommendations.title: Rebalance Investment Portfolio
recommendations.description: Rebalance investment portfolio to maintain a 60% stock and 40% bond allocation to minimize risk and maximize returns.
recommendations.reasoning: User's goal tracking result shows a high-risk investment portfolio, which can be optimized to minimize risk and maximize returns.
